title: Corrigendum to “Evaluation of Texture Analysis Parameter for Response Prediction in Patients with Hepatocellular Carcinoma Undergoing Drug-Eluting Bead Transarterial Chemoembolization (DEB-TACE) Using Biphasic Contrast-Enhanced CT Image Data Correlation with Liver Perfusion CT” [Acad Radiol 24 (2017): 1352–1363]
